Machine_Learning.title: Machine Learning
Machine_Learning.description: This course by Stanford University provides a broad introduction to machine learning, datamining, and statistical pattern recognition.
Machine_Learning.why_recommended: This highly rated course is taught by Andrew Ng, a pioneer in the field, and covers both theoretical and practical aspects.

Machine_Learning.title: Machine Learning A-Z: Hands-On Python & R In Data Science
Machine_Learning.description: This course will teach you to create Machine Learning algorithms in Python and R from two Data Science experts.
Machine_Learning.why_recommended: The course is practical with lots of coding exercises and is well-structured for beginners.

React.js.title: React - The Complete Guide (incl Hooks, React Router, Redux)
React.js.description: Dive in and learn React.js from scratch! Learn Reactjs, Hooks, Redux, React Routing, Animations, Next.js and way more!
React.js.why_recommended: This course is comprehensive, updated regularly and has plenty of practical examples.

React.js.title: Full-Stack Web Development with React
React.js.description: This course is part of a Specialization and will teach you to develop and deploy React.js App on the front end, a Node.js/Express server on the back end, and MongoDB as the database layer.
React.js.why_recommended: A well-rounded course that covers not only React.js but also full-stack development.

Docker.title: Docker Mastery: with Kubernetes +Swarm from a Docker Captain
Docker.description: Build, test, deploy containers with the best mega-course on Docker, Kubernetes, Compose, Swarm and Registry using DevOps.
Docker.why_recommended: The course is comprehensive and includes hands-on coding exercises.

Docker.title: Learn Docker & Containers using Interactive Browser-Based Scenarios
Docker.description: This course provides a hands-on introduction to Docker and Containers, using interactive scenarios that you can try out directly from your web browser.
Docker.why_recommended: It offers an interactive environment which is great for beginners to understand Docker and containers.
